website_summaries.verdict: This is the perfect on-the-go fillet knife because it's compact and folds up easily for storage in a pocket or tackle box.
pros: Folds up for compact storage inside a pocket or bag
Holds an edge well and is ready to use right out of the box
cons: There have been a few complaints of the folding mechanism breaking

customer_reviews.title: Sharp, Good Flex, Comfortable, Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I used to turn up my nose to the idea of a folding filet knife... after losing a couple of my prized knives and always trying to work around the storage of those knives, I caved. I thought, I'll just stash this in my tackle box and it'll always be there just in case the need arose. Turns out this knife is no joke. It's sharp and holds an edge well, it's got good flex and yet has a solid rigidity. The lock is sturdy and the knife feels safe and comfortable. This is the best filet knife I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I've had this knife for nearly 4 years now. Cleaned gobs of fish and have not really taken any special care of it. It holds an edge very well and is incredibly resistant to rust. From trout on the clear lakes here in Alaska, to salmon on the silty glacier rivers, and rockfish and lingcod in the saltwater. This thing doesnt have a spec of rust. It is easily my favorite filet knife. Well my fixed blade buck filet is up there but this one gets alot more use in the field.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff L

customer_reviews.title: Best fillet knife!!!
customer_reviews.text: I work as fresh tuna grader at a fish company so I always need reliable knife that is able to cut through tough tuna skin daily. I have tried so many different fillet knives, and this one by far is the most reliable one. It stays pretty sharp for at least 3-4 months without sharpening it even though I cut through tuna skin with it at least 4-5 days a week. I have owned this knife for about a year and so far it has not broken or gotten loose. It is very well constructed and reliable. I actually bought one for my co-worker and another one for myself so I now own 2 of this knife.
customer_reviews.author: Coconut

customer_reviews.title: It's very sturdy. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend it for anyone ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son because he needed a packable fillet knife, expected somewhat flimsy junk knife to be honest but we were blown away when it came in and we tested the lockout and functionality. It's very sturdy. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend it for anyone needing a more compact fillet knife than your standard stuff.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: This is a good knife. However
customer_reviews.text: This is a good knife. However,it is a very long knife. I joked that it is a sword. It is not a useful knife for small fish. It would be great for larger fish. The knife did come out of the box very sharp. In my opinion it is not worth $30 or $40.
customer_reviews.author: Roderick

customer_reviews.title: great knife
customer_reviews.text: this is a great knife. Being able to fold a fillet knife makes it a lot more portable, plus it's comfortable, sharp, and sturdy. It looks good, too. It's stiff and solid, so might not be the best for those that prefer a more flexible fillet blade. My brother used it, and he thinks EVERYTHING is inferior to whatever he used, and he complimented it... so it must be pretty good haha
customer_reviews.author: truthsayer1

customer_reviews.title: You can't fillet a fish with this
customer_reviews.text: Not a filet knife but a good knife. This blade is way too stiff to fillet fish but is good for cutting through the back bone or gutting fish. It arrives sharp and holds an edge well. Again, not worth a beans as a fillet knife but still a nice knife in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Great knife for it’s purpose period!
customer_reviews.text: Not generally a great fan of folders for hunting knives but this is a very well made, razor sharp out of the box breathing knife that is perfect for its purpose! I appreciate being able to just fold it and throw it in my duck or fishing bag!
customer_reviews.author: Longbowsafari

customer_reviews.title: Sharp flexible knife
customer_reviews.text: My father in law is an avid fisher and my mother in Law had stolen his filet knife for using in her kitchen because her knives are so old and cheap. This is sharp, and I love the folding ability. His old one did not fold and always made me nervous when he packed it away to use. My mother in law was so impressed she teased she was going to steal this one as well. He's used it and says it's a great sharp knife and its always the first he reaches for.
customer_reviews.author: ca.roybal

customer_reviews.title: Stays amazingly sharp
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with Buck knife. I bought all my fishing buds one of these as gifts the last couple of years. Sharpens easy and lasts. It being a folding is great if you have kids around. We keep one in the kitchen drawer too.
customer_reviews.author: Steve McClure

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, can't handle salt water, rust after a few fishing trips
customer_reviews.text: This knife looks good, the blade is very sharp. But after a few occasional fishing days here and there, the knife no longer locks in the open position. It's probably a great knife if you need one for one fishing trip. But don't count on it for your second trip...
customer_reviews.author: dave m

customer_reviews.title: Love this knife
customer_reviews.text: I love Buck knives but this thing takes it all for me. It seems like great quality and folds down well to fit in my fishing pack. Easy to clean and not worried about it rusting
customer_reviews.author: cavaliersam

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Fishing Fillet Knife
customer_reviews.text: Buck knife company has it's act together. Perfect knife for the tackle box since it folds up. I think I might get an extra one and put it in my utensil drawer for the house when I fillet fish on my cutting board. Very sharp and just the right flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: scout

customer_reviews.title: Nice knife
customer_reviews.text: Very nice knife. Good quality, razor sharp. Certainly not a pocket knife (unless you have really deep pockets). That said, it is a good, manageable length for fillet use, and what I expected. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Keyboard Midas

customer_reviews.title: Great knife for camping
customer_reviews.text: I've had this knife for six years, using it every summer for camping. It's a great size and holds the edge very well. I'm getting rid of the other knife I have for camping and getting another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Libby B.

customer_reviews.title: Where's the flex?
customer_reviews.text: Seemed way too stiff. Does not flex like a filet knife should. Sharp enough and feels sturdy, folding feature is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice knife for the money. pretty long which i wanted. Came sharp
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift for my Dad
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my dad. This was perfect for him and he loves it! It came very sharp out the box, looks amazing and of course it's a Buck Knife so it boasts superior quality and a lifetime warranty! I recommend this for those who want a more portable but quality fillet knife that will both fit in your pocket and get the job done on your catch! 10/10 highly recommended, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Rogue

customer_reviews.title: sharp
customer_reviews.text: this fillet knife is perfect sharp long and still compact and elegant
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love this knife!
customer_reviews.text: Great filet knife. Razor sharp with a nice ergonomic handle. I used it on a large chinook salmon and was very pleased with the results. The groove makes it easier to store in a drawer but harder to clean. Buck makes superior knives (I own several) and they have amazing customer service. Doesn't hurt that their factory is in Post Falls Idaho just a few miles away.
customer_reviews.author: MDSWA

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife
customer_reviews.text: The knife was everything I could have asked for and more. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: George Milburn Jannusch

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s a ten , pure Buck quality, will buy another!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic ...
customer_reviews.text: ...overall fillet option. Solid lockup, can do bluegill to grouper depending on grip and how much of blade you need to use. Plus takes up little room folded up. Steel is not high end but has great temper, perfect choice for the purpose, resharpens in a flash on anything you like to use. Yeah, PRC made, sigh, but my apolitical bucks say they were still well spent.
customer_reviews.author: doogle

customer_reviews.title: Great knife, well built, great handle.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this knife. It's a little heavy to carry on a lightweight trip, but it's a well built knife. I own several fillet knives, and this one ranks right up there.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan, Noah, Dad

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad for his birthday. He is an avid fisherman and he says this is the best fillet knife he has ever owned. The fact it folds up makes it easy to carry around safely. Dad liked it so much that I bought one for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: BabeOBooks

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: Easily one of the best knives I've every bought. Sharp, good blade. Nice handle and the folding aspect us marvelous. It's an all purpose for me while camping or home.
customer_reviews.author: Jewell

customer_reviews.title: My New Butcher Knife
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for my son for Xmas last year and fell in love with it. However, I do not use as a fillet knife. I use it as a butcher knife. Being a hunter who processes his own, I use it for skinning and butchering deer. The non slip handle and long thin blade make this job much easier than using my Buck hunting knife. It is a great quality knife but beware, it is very long.
customer_reviews.author: charles w lennon

customer_reviews.title: fits well and sharp
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the knife - cuts through the bones and provides a good filet.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Brunson

customer_reviews.title: I love that this folds up
customer_reviews.text: I love that this folds up! Hold an edge nicely! Worked great on my Alaskan fishing trip over 6 days
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be very poor quality and potentially dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Initially Blade did not lock automatically, I needed to push down on the metal locking mechanism. I used a few times and the blade did not hold and folded backwards. Seems to be very poor quality and potentially dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Astor

customer_reviews.title: Folding fishknife
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and not too heavy. Sharp As you could ever want. Takes up very little space.
customer_reviews.author: The Ops Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great folding fillet knife
customer_reviews.text: I love this knife. Very sharp when delivered. Well made. Great value. This is my go to travel fillet knife.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Hohler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome knife.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome knife... love the folding feature, easier for traveling with it. It also has a nice weight to it, feels comfortable in the hand too =)
customer_reviews.author: Jeralyn

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have one
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and sharp! It is exactly what I wanted for my grandson and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Susan S

customer_reviews.title: Great blade, locks solid, easily fits in a pocket.
customer_reviews.text: Great blade, holds an edge well so far. Works great for filleting larger fish (3-8 lb Cutthroat Trout). I use it regularly for filleting and skinning. Because it Is a folder, the handle is a little long, but the ability to fold and drop in a pocket makes it worth it. The back lock feels nice and secure. The rubberized handle keeps it from becoming slippery.
customer_reviews.author: croak

customer_reviews.title: A very fine unit, came very sharp from package
customer_reviews.text: A very fine unit, came very sharp from package, and folding action is smooth. Just sorry Buck made the decision to manufacture in China????????
customer_reviews.author: Van Fraysier

customer_reviews.title: Needs more sharpening
customer_reviews.text: I like this knife a lot, as it is easy to just carry in my trouser pocket when fishing. It opens and closes very easily. I would have given 5 stars had it been sharper when I purchased it. However, the steel is quick to sharpen on my japanese water stones, and I could get it razor-sharp. Only time can tell how the quality of the steel is.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Jones

customer_reviews.title: Buck
customer_reviews.text: Buck knives are we some !! This one really needs extra care as it rusts very fast after use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this knife!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been fishing professionally for over 25 yrs. He got this knive as a gift and liked it so much we found it here on Amazon and bought another. We also bought a couple more for stocking stuffers for our son-in-laws. Would recommend it to any outdoorsman.
customer_reviews.author: Seabrz

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Would recommend to all my fishing buddies!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Fillets fish right off their bone and I am able to store the knife without a holster because it folds in. I would recommend this. For sure.
customer_reviews.author: MikeB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing knife
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box this knife is very, very sharp but I expect nothing but that from Buck. Fillets fish easily. What can I say that others haven't said already... well made, great grips, very happy!
customer_reviews.author: kyoung

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a very good quality knife
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a very good quality knife. Heavier than I expected. I planned on using it as a de-boning knife, but it's way too big for packing lightly. I will use it at home for cutting meat and fish.
customer_reviews.author: Jason King

customer_reviews.title: I'm Surprised!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's made in China. But this is a well built heavy duty sharp fillet knife! I actually like it better than my Morakniv fillet knife!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Coy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. Great sharp folding fillet knife. For the price, you can't complain! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: It's his favorite fillet knif he's owned
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad. It's his favorite fillet knif he's owned. And he's had a million over the years.
customer_reviews.author: AUSTIN

customer_reviews.title: This thing is impressive!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a fillet knife to use on camping trips, and was really happy to find one that folds up. I always worried about bending of breaking my other non-folding knifes, but this one takes care of that. It's also nice to see that it includes a life time warranty.
customer_reviews.author: VU Engineer

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed to see it was not made in the USA
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed to see it was not made in the USA. Nice knife, not the sharpest I have purchased, thus the 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: IDgrandma

customer_reviews.title: Great filet knife for travelling.
customer_reviews.text: Great knife. Yes, there are better filet knives that have better flex but the convenience and safety of a folding blade to keep in my boat bag outweighs the cutting advantages of a longer non-folding filet knife.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and light
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time we ordered this. The last one was stolen. Great filet knife.
customer_reviews.author: HiloStyle

customer_reviews.title: Having it fold is so much better then a sheath
customer_reviews.text: Arrives very sharp and holds up well. Having it fold is so much better then a sheath.
customer_reviews.author: David W

customer_reviews.title: A decent overseas made buck knife.
customer_reviews.text: Other than the fact it is made overseas, I can not give it a full 5 stars. As for performance, I carry mine with me when I hit the water and dressed a many of fish with it.
customer_reviews.author: hoffmiermp

customer_reviews.title: Feels great in the hand and does a great job
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp and very functional. Feels great in the hand and does a great job. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: The Colonel

customer_reviews.title: Now this is a fillet knife.
customer_reviews.text: I have a bunch of fillet knives and they all have a purpose but to take one out on a fishing trip is not convenient, long and requires a sheath. So along comes this Folding Fillet Knife, very convenient at the beach or mountains. Big enough for sea bass, redfish, steelhead or salmon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice knife, son and husband love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband and my son for Christmas presents and they both love it. Nice to have a folding filet knife for fishing trips. Super sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Jolynn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best filet knife I own. Portable and really sharp. Good steal.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Scannelli

customer_reviews.title: but it appeared to be a very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it. I bought it for a gift, but it appeared to be a very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SHARP!
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow, this thing can cut through anything. I've used it to filet fish and it goes right through the bone, scales, everything. I even use it to filet chicken breasts, and it'll slice right through a frozen one no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Adoniram

customer_reviews.title: HOLY GRAIL OF FILETS!
customer_reviews.text: This knife is extremely sharp, flexible and compact for it's size. I couldn't believe how sharp this was from the box. The folding feature is nice for both safety whilst backpacking but makes it much easier to store between uses... Plus it's a BUCK so if it ever fails, send it back and get a new one for a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS G.

customer_reviews.title: Great knife!, Very sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Great knife!! Got this as a gift for my fishing friend, He even uses it as his main cooking knife, and dinner table knife....Was almost sharp enough to shave arm hairs, a minute on a strop, and it was good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Kokero

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: A little stiff blade which is excellent for my uses. The blade is extremely sharp and has held it's edge through dozens of fish so far. My only wish for a future model would be to enable the blade to lock when closed to prevent any accidental opening.
customer_reviews.author: K Kanzo

customer_reviews.title: and holds a good edge through several fish before needing the steel
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp, durable, portable, and holds a good edge through several fish before needing the steel. Not quite long enough for large salmon, but works well for smaller fish.
customer_reviews.author: A. Roach

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Wife got this for my b-day and man did she score a home run! This fillet knife not only feels good in your hand but works equally as well. Cleans up in a snap. I look forward to the cleaning just to be able to use this knife.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Tidwell

customer_reviews.title: Very long, Very thin with a good grip and blade lock, not quick opening
customer_reviews.text: Nice rubber surfaced grip on this folding Fillet knife, locking blade all very solid for the price. It is very large, but still possible to place in a front pocket, sticking out a bit. Not fast opening however.
customer_reviews.author: Owen Shiverdecker

customer_reviews.title: Fillet Knife
customer_reviews.text: This is a Big Knife, which is what I was looking for. Has a great grip. I like the balance and is very sharp. Lost my last fillet knife in a fishing boo boo. Wife accidentally deep sixed it with the leftover bait.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Guy

customer_reviews.title: One great knife
customer_reviews.text: I have not used it so far but it is sure nice. Blade thin and very sharp. The handle is easy to grip. It is a big solid knife., I hope to use it a lot this summer at the beach. Catch lots of fish everyone....
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: For fishing!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality! Right size for tackle box. Just what I needed!!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa S Byars

customer_reviews.title: He loved it.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to my fisherman friend. He loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Folding makes it nice to carry in your bag or tackle box
customer_reviews.text: Solid feel and holds an edge. Folding makes it nice to carry in your bag or tackle box.
customer_reviews.author: Pomrus

customer_reviews.title: great folding filet knife.
customer_reviews.text: I was immediately impressed at the overall size of the knife.I fish saltwater and this knife is large enough to handle anything that swims. It is also very well made with a solid feel to it. The blade has an excellent shape and the handle design is very comfortable. Even though the steel is not on par with my 100$ shun and Henkel filet knives i would still give it 5 stars just because of the price. I have cleaned several 20 lb stripers with this knife and it still has a decent edge. I keep it in my wading gear and it has held up to the corrosive environment pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: kevin w.

customer_reviews.title: Great knife!
customer_reviews.text: This knife is unbelievable! My only downfall about it is that I told my wife about it. She commandeered it from me right away.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome filet knife. This knife is obviously a top notch product, I have had many filet knives and this one has a good strong balde and great handle. Its obviuosly a type of knife that will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Buck Silver Creek TM Folding Fillet Knife
customer_reviews.text: This is a tough knife and extremely sharp. It was purchased for a teenager who loves to fish. He was very pleased with it. I was disappointed to discover that Buck knives are made in China now.
customer_reviews.author: bugtussletx

customer_reviews.title: Rust
customer_reviews.text: I used this knife twice on a recent saltwater fishing trip. I cleaned and dryed it both times but still got rust. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good knife
customer_reviews.text: Great fillet knife. That fact that is folds is such a great feature. Saves space in my tackle box and no need to worry about losing the sheath. It keeps an edge well and seems like it will last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Matras

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping/backpacking trips.
customer_reviews.text: Love this filet knife. It stows away easily and stayed sharp after cleaning fish for 7 days in Canada. Highly recommend this high quality knife.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Larson

customer_reviews.title: Great knife.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that this filet knife folds! It fits easily in my tackle bag I don't have to worry about getting a sheath or cutting myself while transporting it. Only negative is Iveish it was a bit more Sharp and flexible but you can't beat it for the price
customer_reviews.author: Colleen M.

customer_reviews.title: Great knife
customer_reviews.text: This knife is perfect for carrying in my backpack. It has a very good hand feel and does not get slippery when wet. It has the proper amount of flex and holds an edge very well. This is the first knife I reach for when filleting fish.
customer_reviews.author: Marko

customer_reviews.title: Made in China...
customer_reviews.text: Nice knife, only drawback to paying a decent price is this knife is made in China.
customer_reviews.author: mgesellschap

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for the fisherman in my life and he absolutely LOVES it. He says it the sharpest and sturdiest filet knife he's ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: R.A.E.

customer_reviews.title: Great Knife
customer_reviews.text: I like how it's a very compact, shape, flexible, and fillets great. Store right in my tackle box and doesn't take a lot of room. I highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Beautiul knife!
customer_reviews.text: Havent gone out fishing since I received the knife yet to try it out on some fresh walleye, but I will tell you that it comes out of the box razor sharp, and is built very solid, great shape of the knife in my hand, and the added length compared to my other filetting knives will be a plus without it seeming bulky or thick.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Knife for fishing
customer_reviews.text: Read the other reviews, I did. It's a buck knife. Always need a fillet knife. This one is handy and well made. I've broken or distorted many others. Not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Quinlan.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A excellent product. Very easy to use and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Jer

customer_reviews.title: OK Knife
customer_reviews.text: I had an older version of this knife for years. The older version seemed to have a higher quality, more durable blade. The new one has a coated s/s blade that seems a little flimsy. Time will tell. Craftsmanship on the new one seems a little lacking for a Buck knife.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL M.

customer_reviews.title: Exremely sharp!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect knife for any kitchen. The folding part is great as to keep you safe when reaching into a kitchen drawer. It slices our Salmon (skin on) with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Boot

customer_reviews.title: Great fillet knife
customer_reviews.text: Best fillet knife I have ever owned. Very sharp, long blade allows it to be used on a wide variety of species. Easy to fold and store.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very solid knife - this one will be around for quite a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sput   Nick

customer_reviews.title: and it became one of my favorite. One
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp and it can cut the paper. I have many knives.. and it became one of my favorite. One
customer_reviews.author: student75

customer_reviews.title: Great knife!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic folding filet knife and comes super sharp right out of the box. My hunting & fishing cousin adores it.
customer_reviews.author: Reader Girl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great filet knife. i use it on specks. stays sharp for long time.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great knifes very sharp and safe
customer_reviews.text: Love this filet knife put it into my EDC bag
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Awsome filet fishing knife
customer_reviews.text: The largest foldable knife in my tackle box. Stays sharp. Great camping knife when fileting fish. Great grip on the handle makes it non slip.
customer_reviews.author: P. Toleikis

customer_reviews.title: Awesomely Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Super sharp, Solid Construction, Nice rubberized grip to keep my hand on the handle. Overall a good product, Buck! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: AGH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this folds for safety fits in pocket when fishin and sharp
customer_reviews.author: bear

customer_reviews.title: feels pretty light and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Need a portable folding filet knife? This is the one. I've shopped around. Bought several. Most aren't sharp out of the box and don't hold an edge. The Rappala is so poorly made there's a millimeter gap between the blade and locking spine and the whole blade wiggles around when locked. The CRKT is a hybrid folder. Doesn't do a True fold -has a goofy blade tip extender that doubles as a blade lock when open.. feels pretty light and cheap. But CRKT usually holds an edge.. This is a Buck. They make very decent knifes for a decent price. Well built, feels nice in the hand, comes sharp and I'm sure will last a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Garber

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the money
customer_reviews.text: Best knife I've had...... Super razor sharp blade.. Solid construction and solid backbone. Best folding knife you will ever get to use.
customer_reviews.author: Keith W. Oxford

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a year now, and it is the boss!
customer_reviews.author: Ferndaly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome knife!
customer_reviews.text: I love love the quality and overall look and feel of this knife! It's so awesome! Very sharp! Won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Lothert

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy knife
customer_reviews.text: I've never been disappointed with Buck knives and this one was not an exception. It's sharp, sturdy and feels good in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Bornfree

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, large, and strong.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, strong, very sharp, gets the job done at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: KBAD

product_meta.title: Buck 0220BLS Knives Silver Creek Folding Fillet Fishing Knife
product_meta.description: 7 5/8" closed lockback. 6 3/8" 420 J2 stainless titanium coated flexible blade. Blue glass reinforced polypropylene with TPE rubberized handle. Stainless guard. Lanyard.
